cant-react: I need the 'Add Reactions' permission in this channel to create a poll.
no-channel: I can't find the specified channel, please select another one.

text-modal.title: Create a poll
text-modal.label: Enter the poll text
text-modal.placeholder: The text will be sent as it is, so feel free to use emojis and markdown.
text-modal.success: We're preparing your message, hang on a second...

too-many-options: Due to Discord limitations, I can't use default emojis with more than 10 options. Please allow me to use external emojis, or reduce the number of options to 10 or less.
